es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.nn.user.sim

Class UserSimilarity<U>

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.uam.eps.ir.ranksys.nn.user.sim.UserSimilarity<U>
  • Type Parameters:
    U - type of the users
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    UserIndex<U>, FastUserIndex<U>, Similarity
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SetCosineUserSimilarity, SetJaccardUserSimilarity, VectorCosineUserSimilarity, VectorJaccardUserSimilarity

    public abstract class UserSimilarity<U>
extends Object
implements Similarity, FastUserIndex<U>
    User similarity. It wraps a generic fast similarity and a fast user index.
    Author:
    Sa√∫l Vargas (saul.vargas@uam.es)
